name: Boiling Static
description:
Nightmare type experience where you plunder a dead city to find yourself the perfect snack... Only to realize that you were allergic to shrimp the whole time...

Based on a nightmare I had, made with the help of my pals in a voice call.

INSPIRED BY MODUS INTERACTIVE'S LAPUTA SERIES: https://modus-interactive.itch.io/laputa

---

WASD to Walk

ARROW KEYS to Look

SHIFT to Run

---

Find shrimp

eat shrimp

feel good :))

---

Thanks to the members in the HPS1 discord who were in the voice call with me, providing assets and kinda bein freakin chill:

Valerie Dusk

Jamathan

Bryce Bucher

Micah

Music is Everywhere at the End of Time by The Caretaker

Please don't ask how the shrimp got there I swear to god it wasn't me please forgi
